response.overview: Alberto Angela recounts the places, stories, and records of Turin, accompanied by protagonists from the world of sport, music, and culture on a fascinating journey through historic buildings, porticoes, and elegant cafés.
response.tagline: Alberto Angela recounts the places, stories, and records of Turin, accompanied by protagonists from the world of sport, music, and culture on a fascinating journey through historic buildings, porticoes, and elegant cafés.
response.title: Stanotte a Torino
